title: Simon Cowell is going back to US TV as a judge on America's Got Talent - America's Got Talent Reality TV -
text: Simon Cowell will return to US TV to be a judge on the next series of America's Got Talent.The X Factor creator will appear on the show following Howard Stern's exit. © ITV / Thames Cowell co-created America's Got Talent, although he has never appeared as a judge on the NBC talent contest before. Stern even tipped Cowell for the job when he announced his departure in June. © Rex Features / David FisherSimon Cowell He told Us Weekly that it was the network's decision to bring him back, saying: "We've been talking about it for a few years, funny enough, me and NBC. This year... everything worked. So it was perfect." © ITV / Thames/Syco/Fremantle MediaSimon Cowell and his Top 6 Overs Cowell has revealed that he really wanted the Girls category on The X Factor this year, after getting in a huff over receiving the Overs."[I wanted] the girls, because there's just some incredible singers in that category, and I kind of psyched myself up, and then of course you forget you're on TV, then you watch it back, it's like, 'Oh god, I shouldn't have said that'," he told Good Morning Britain.The most recent series of America's Got Talent finished in September, with British ventriloquist Paul Zerdin winning.
